00001 module cmfd_snes_solver
00002 
00003   use cmfd_loss_operator,     only: loss_operator,init_M_operator,             &
00004  &                                  build_loss_matrix,destroy_M_operator
00005   use cmfd_prod_operator,     only: prod_operator,init_F_operator,             &
00006  &                                  build_prod_matrix,destroy_F_operator
00007   use cmfd_jacobian_operator, only: jacobian_operator,init_J_operator,         &
00008  &                                  build_jacobian_matrix,destroy_J_operator,  &
00009  &                                  operators
00010   use cmfd_slepc_solver,      only: cmfd_slepc_execute
00011 
00012 implicit none
00013 
00014 #include <finclude/petsc.h90>
00015 
00016   type(jacobian_operator) :: jac_prec
00017   type(operators) :: ctx
00018 
00019   Mat         :: jac         ! jacobian matrix
00020 ! Mat         :: jac_prec    ! preconditioned jacobian matrix
00021   Vec         :: resvec      ! residual vector
00022   Vec         :: xvec        ! results
00023   KSP         :: ksp         ! linear solver context
00024   PC          :: pc          ! preconditioner
00025   SNES        :: snes        ! nonlinear solver context
00026   integer     :: ierr        ! error flag

00030 !===============================================================================
00031 ! CMFD_SNES_EXECUTE
00032 !===============================================================================
00033 
00034   subroutine cmfd_snes_execute()
00035 
00036     ! call slepc solver 
00037     call cmfd_slepc_execute()
00038 
00039     ! initialize data
00040     call init_data()
00041 
00042     ! initialize solver
00043     call init_solver()
00044 
00045     ! solve the system
00046     call SNESSolve(snes,PETSC_NULL,xvec,ierr)
00047 
00048     ! extracts results to cmfd object
00049     call extract_results()
00050 
00051     ! deallocate all slepc data
00052     call finalize()
00053 
00054   end subroutine cmfd_snes_execute
00055 
00056 !===============================================================================
00057 ! INIT_DATA allocates matrices vectors for CMFD solution
00058 !===============================================================================
00059 
00060   subroutine init_data()
00061 
00062     use global, only: cmfd,rank,n_procs
00063 
00064     integer              :: k         ! implied do counter
00065     integer              :: n         ! problem size
00066     integer              :: row_start ! local row start
00067     integer              :: row_end   ! local row end
00068     integer, allocatable :: nnzv(:)   ! vector of number of nonzeros in jacobian
00069     real(8), pointer     :: xptr(:)   ! solution pointer
00070 
00071     ! set up operator matrices
00072     call init_M_operator(ctx%loss)
00073     call init_F_operator(ctx%prod)
00074     call init_J_operator(jac_prec,ctx)
00075 
00076     ! get problem size
00077     n = jac_prec%n
00078 
00079     ! create PETSc vectors
00080     call VecCreateMPI(PETSC_COMM_WORLD,jac_prec%localn,PETSC_DECIDE,resvec,ierr)
00081     call VecCreateMPI(PETSC_COMM_WORLD,jac_prec%localn,PETSC_DECIDE,xvec,ierr)
00082 
00083     ! get the local dimensions for each process
00084     call VecGetOwnershipRange(xvec,row_start,row_end,ierr)
00085 
00086     if (rank == n_procs - 1) row_end = n
00087 
00088     ! set flux in guess
00089     call VecSetValues(xvec,row_end-row_start,(/(k,k=row_start,row_end-1)/),  &
00090    &                  cmfd%phi(row_start+1:row_end),INSERT_VALUES,ierr)
00091     call VecAssemblyBegin(xvec,ierr)
00092     call VecAssemblyEnd(xvec,ierr)
00093 
00094     ! set keff in guess
00095     if (rank == n_procs - 1) then
00096       call VecGetArrayF90(xvec,xptr,ierr)
00097       xptr(size(xptr)) = 1.0_8/cmfd%keff
00098       call VecRestoreArrayF90(xvec,xptr,ierr)
00099     end if
00100 
00101   end subroutine init_data
00102 
00103 !===============================================================================
00104 ! INIT_SOLVER
00105 !===============================================================================
00106 
00107   subroutine init_solver()
00108 
00109     character(LEN=20) :: snestype,ksptype,pctype
00110 
00111     ! turn on mf_operator option
00112     call PetscOptionsSetValue("-snes_mf_operator","TRUE",ierr)
00113 
00114     ! create SNES context
00115     call SNESCreate(PETSC_COMM_WORLD,snes,ierr)
00116 
00117     ! set the residual function
00118     call SNESSetFunction(snes,resvec,compute_nonlinear_residual,PETSC_NULL,ierr)
00119 
00120     ! set GMRES solver
00121     call SNESGetKSP(snes,ksp,ierr)
00122     call KSPSetType(ksp,KSPGMRES,ierr)
00123 
00124     ! set preconditioner
00125     call KSPGetPC(ksp,pc,ierr)
00126     call PCSetType(pc,PCHYPRE,ierr)
00127     call PCSetFromOptions(pc,ierr)
00128     call KSPSetFromOptions(ksp,ierr)
00129 
00130     ! create matrix free jacobian
00131     call MatCreateSNESMF(snes,jac,ierr)
00132 
00133     ! set matrix free finite difference
00134     call SNESSetJacobian(snes,jac,jac_prec,build_jacobian_matrix,ctx,ierr)
00135 
00136     ! set lags
00137     call SNESSetLagJacobian(snes,-2,ierr)
00138     call SNESSetLagPreconditioner(snes,-1,ierr)
00139 
00140     ! set convergence
00141     call SNESSetTolerances(snes,1.0e-8_8,1.0e-8_8,1.0e-8_8,50,10000,ierr)
00142 
00143     ! set SNES options
00144     call SNESSetFromOptions(snes,ierr)
00145 
00146     ! turn off line searching
00147 !   call SNESLineSearchSet(snes,SNESLineSearchNo,PETSC_NULL,ierr)
00148 
00149     ! get all types and print
00150     call SNESGetType(snes,snestype,ierr)
00151     call KSPGetType(ksp,ksptype,ierr)
00152     call PCGetType(pc,pctype,ierr)
00153 
00154     ! display information to user
00155 !   write(*,'(/,A)') 'SNES SOLVER OPTIONS:'
00156 !   write(*,*) '---------------------'
00157 !   write(*,*) 'SNES TYPE IS: ',snestype
00158 !   write(*,*) 'KSP TYPE IS: ',ksptype
00159 !   write(*,*) 'PC TYPE IS: ',pctype
00160 
00161   end subroutine init_solver
00162 
00163 !===============================================================================
00164 ! COMPUTE_NONLINEAR_RESIDUAL
00165 !===============================================================================
00166 
00167   subroutine compute_nonlinear_residual(snes,x,res,ierr)
00168 
00169     use global, only: rank,n_procs
00170 
00171     ! arguments
00172     SNES        :: snes          ! nonlinear solver context
00173     Vec         :: x             ! independent vector
00174     Vec         :: res           ! residual vector
00175     integer     :: ierr          ! error flag
00176 
00177     ! local variables
00178     Vec         :: phi           ! flux vector
00179     Vec         :: rphi          ! flux part of residual
00180     Vec         :: phiM          ! M part of residual flux calc
00181     integer     :: n             ! problem size
00182     real(8)     :: lambda        ! eigenvalue
00183     real(8)     :: reslamb       ! residual for lambda
00184 
00185     real(8), pointer :: xptr(:)  ! pointer to solution vector
00186     real(8), pointer :: rptr(:)  ! pointer to residual vector
00187 PetscViewer :: viewer
00188 
00189     ! create operators
00190     call build_loss_matrix(ctx%loss)
00191     call build_prod_matrix(ctx%prod)
00192 
00193     ! get problem size
00194     n = ctx%loss%n 
00195 
00196     ! get pointers to vectors
00197     call VecGetArrayF90(x,xptr,ierr)
00198     call VecGetArrayF90(res,rptr,ierr)
00199 
00200     ! create petsc vector for flux
00201     call VecCreateMPI(PETSC_COMM_WORLD,ctx%loss%localn,PETSC_DECIDE,phi,ierr)
00202     call VecCreateMPI(PETSC_COMM_WORLD,ctx%loss%localn,PETSC_DECIDE,rphi,ierr)
00203 
00204     ! extract flux and place in petsc vector 
00205     call VecPlaceArray(phi,xptr,ierr)
00206     call VecPlaceArray(rphi,rptr,ierr)
00207 
00208     ! extract eigenvalue and broadcast (going to want to make this more general in future)
00209     if (rank == n_procs - 1) lambda = xptr(size(xptr)) 
00210     call MPI_BCAST(lambda,1,MPI_REAL8,n_procs-1,MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00211 
00212     ! create new petsc vectors to perform math
00213     call VecCreateMPI(PETSC_COMM_WORLD,ctx%loss%localn,PETSC_DECIDE,phiM,ierr)
00214 
00215     ! calculate flux part of residual vector
00216     call MatMult(ctx%loss%M,phi,phiM,ierr)
00217     call MatMult(ctx%prod%F,phi,rphi,ierr)
00218     call VecAYPX(rphi,-1.0_8*lambda,phiM,ierr)
00219 
00220     ! set eigenvalue part of residual vector
00221     call VecDot(phi,phi,reslamb,ierr)
00222 
00223     ! map to ptr
00224     if (rank == n_procs) rptr(size(rptr)) = 0.5_8 - 0.5_8*reslamb
00225 
00226     ! reset arrays that are not used
00227     call VecResetArray(phi,ierr)
00228     call VecResetArray(rphi,ierr)
00229 
00230     ! restore arrays for residual and solution
00231     call VecRestoreArrayF90(x,xptr,ierr)
00232     call VecRestoreArrayF90(res,rptr,ierr)
00233 
00234     ! destroy all temp vectors
00235     call VecDestroy(phi,ierr)
00236     call VecDestroy(phiM,ierr)
00237     call VecDestroy(rphi,ierr)
00238 
00239     ! write out matrix in binary file (debugging)
00240     call PetscViewerBinaryOpen(PETSC_COMM_WORLD,'residual.bin' &
00241    &     ,FILE_MODE_WRITE,viewer,ierr)
00242     call VecView(res,viewer,ierr)
00243     call PetscViewerDestroy(viewer,ierr)
00244 
00245     call PetscViewerBinaryOpen(PETSC_COMM_WORLD,'x.bin' &
00246    &     ,FILE_MODE_WRITE,viewer,ierr)
00247     call VecView(x,viewer,ierr)
00248     call PetscViewerDestroy(viewer,ierr)
00249 
00250   end subroutine compute_nonlinear_residual
00251 
00252 !===============================================================================
00253 ! EXTRACT_RESULTS
00254 !===============================================================================
00255 
00256   subroutine extract_results()
00257 
00258     use global, only: cmfd,rank,n_procs
00259 
00260     integer :: n ! problem size
00261     integer              :: row_start ! local row start
00262     integer              :: row_end   ! local row end
00263     real(8),allocatable  :: mybuf(:)  ! temp buffer
00264     PetscScalar, pointer :: xptr(:) ! pointer to eigenvector info
00265 
00266     ! get problem size
00267     n = ctx%loss%n
00268 
00269     ! also allocate in cmfd object
00270     if (.not. allocated(cmfd%phi)) allocate(cmfd%phi(n))
00271     if (.not. allocated(mybuf)) allocate(mybuf(n))
00272 
00273     ! get ownership range
00274     call VecGetOwnershipRange(xvec,row_start,row_end,ierr)
00275 
00276     ! resize the last proc
00277     if (rank == n_procs - 1) row_end = row_end - 1
00278 
00279     ! convert petsc phi_object to cmfd_obj
00280     call VecGetArrayF90(xvec,xptr,ierr)
00281     cmfd%phi(row_start+1:row_end) = xptr(1:row_end - row_start) 
00282 
00283     ! reduce result to all 
00284     mybuf = 0.0_8
00285     call MPI_ALLREDUCE(cmfd%phi,mybuf,n,MPI_REAL8,MPI_SUM,MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00286 
00287     ! move buffer to object and deallocate
00288     cmfd%phi = mybuf
00289     if(allocated(mybuf)) deallocate(mybuf)
00290 
00291     ! save eigenvalue
00292     if(rank == n_procs - 1) cmfd%keff = 1.0_8 / xptr(size(xptr))
00293     call MPI_BCAST(cmfd%keff,1,MPI_REAL8,n_procs-1,MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00294     call VecRestoreArrayF90(xvec,xptr,ierr)
00295 
00296   end subroutine extract_results
00297 
00298 !==============================================================================
00299 ! FINALIZE
00300 !==============================================================================
00301 
00302   subroutine finalize()
00303 
00304     ! finalize data objects
00305     call destroy_M_operator(ctx%loss)
00306     call destroy_F_operator(ctx%prod)
00307     call destroy_J_operator(jac_prec)
00308     call VecDestroy(xvec,ierr)
00309     call VecDestroy(resvec,ierr)
00310 
00311     ! finalize solver objects
00312     call SNESDestroy(snes,ierr)
00313 
00314   end subroutine finalize
00315 
00316 end module cmfd_snes_solver
